img_above_text:
He'll be back to his fire attacks here but they'll be much more amped up, so you'll want to knock as much of his health down in the first two rounds as you can.
Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast
img_below_text:
Let the cutscene play, and you'll be returned to the start of Bishui Cave, where you entered after defeating the last cart.
Bishui Cave Complete

img_summary: The image depicts a serene scene within Bishui Cave, featuring a character seated on an ornate stone platform surrounded by intricate carvings and dim lighting. This moment likely serves as a narrative or transitional point in the game, occurring after the intense battle with the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast and preceding the cutscene that returns the player to the cave's entrance.
